attributes.review: Sometimes I do things for the points and the app doesn't give them to me. Other users experience the same. Also they haven't figured out what we're accruing points for.
attributes.title: Doesn't always work right.

attributes.review: Easy to use interface, smooth and simple animations for everything you need. Fun way to stay informed.
attributes.title: Well designed.

attributes.review: It's better than I expected.   Both informative and entertaining.
attributes.title: Well-made and user friendly

attributes.review: This app was just recently released so it's understandably sparse of content but it is very well designed and intuitive.
attributes.title: Bit sparse at the moment but an excellently designed app

attributes.review: This really a great app. If you want a president that believes the government's top priority should be the safety and well-being of its citizens, then you need to vote for Trump and download this app. #MAGA 5/5 tendies.
attributes.title: We have the most terrific apps!

attributes.review: I support trump because he is our best option. Hillary lies and should be in jail by now. I thought this was a fair country where everyone was equal. Apparently, Hillary won't go to jail for a crime she did commit. If mr. Trump would of done that, he would be in jail by far.
attributes.title: TRUMP ALL THE WAY!

attributes.review: Very well laid out, easy to use, tons of info and other things like games just to keep you involved! Good job Team Trump on this one! Needed this all along! Who needs the media, lol
attributes.title: GREAT APP SERIOUSLY!

attributes.review: Awesome App! Trump does everything on a budget because he's so fugal, yet, this App works so smoothly. It's quite surprising that it never has any bugs. It's also laid out very well. #MAGA
attributes.title: Go America!!

attributes.review: A "Trump" app; does it get any better? We the people must forge the country try we want. We must stick together. This app is per definition great.
attributes.title: Does it get any better?

attributes.review: Great app for the candidate I'm voting for. How anyone could possibly support Clinton is beyond me. She's a criminal and her followers are sheep. To all the libtards posting negative reviews here, it's not surprising. You people are shameless, mindless dolts.
attributes.title: Fully support Trump
